code: import React from'react';import axios from'axios';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{connect}from'react-redux';function SinglePost(props){return React.createElement(React.Fragment,null,props.post&&props.user&&props.comments&&React.createElement("div",null,React.createElement("h2",null,"USER NAME: ",props.user.name),React.createElement("h2",null,"TITLE: ",props.post.title),React.createElement("h3",null,"BODY: ",props.post.body),React.createElement("hr",null),React.createElement("h2",null,"COMMENTS"),React.createElement("ul",null,props.comments.map(function(comment){return React.createElement("li",{key:comment.id},comment.body);})),React.createElement("hr",null),React.createElement("p",null,React.createElement(Link,{to:"/users/".concat(props.user.id)},"More posts of author: ",props.user.name))));}var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state,props){var id=props.match.params.id;var post=state.posts.find(function(post){return post.id==id;});if(post){return{post:post,user:state.users.find(function(user){return user.id==post.userId;}),comments:state.comments.filter(function(comment){return comment.postId==id;})};}};export default connect(mapStateToProps)(SinglePost);
